title: Room4Me Desktop
extendedDescription: Room4Me is a apartment rental and sharing platform designed specifically for university students. Developed during Java programming courses at college, it provides a complete digital solution for students seeking affordable housing options and roommate connections.

features.name: User Management
features.description: Complete user registration and authentication system with profile management.

features.name: Property Search
features.description: Advanced apartment search with filters for location, price, capacity, and gender preferences.

features.name: Contact & Export
features.description: Direct owner contact access and CSV export capabilities.
